```{r setup}
library(TimeSeries)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r}
data <- as_tibble(read.delim("Luftdaten_stunde_19480101_20201231_05906.txt",
                             header = T,
                             sep = ";",
                             dec = "."))

data %>% 
  select(time = MESS_DATUM, temp = TT_TU) -> data

perio(data$temp[1:10000])


```
